column4: Can I have dual monitors with compiz? Ubuntu Lucid, ATI Technologies Inc RS482 [Radeon Xpress 200M]
nope, I have that card and I can tell you once you enable the second monitor compiz will not work, unless you have it setup to mirror screens
I have the same, but I'm wondering if there's something one can do about it (like xinerama or whatever).
I have tried, ... major limitation of cheap video cards, I don't see a way to get dual vid + 3D/OpenGL working on the 200m
